Package org.apache.flex.compiler.clients.problems

This package contains classes and interfaces used by clients to report compiler problems.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IProblemFilter
    IProblemFilter defines the interface used by problem filtering objects; a problem filter must be able to accept (or, by returning false, reject) a candidate ICompilerProblem.
    ProblemQueryProvider  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CodeGenErrorFilter
    A problem filter that implements filtering out certain errors from code gen, like StackUnderflow.
    CompilerProblemCategorizer
    Class used to determine if an ICompilerProblem should be reported as an error or a warning.
    ProblemFilterClassCriteria
    IFilter problems based on their class; the filter supports a negative set (don't accept any instances of a given class) and a positive set (only accept instances of a given class).
    ProblemFormatter
    Abstract class that provide useful functionality for formatting and retrieving the localized message of CompilerProblem's.
    ProblemPrinter
    A printer utility class for ICompilerProblems.
    ProblemQuery
    A ProblemQuery presents a higher-level view of a problem stream; it offers facilities to enable or disable diagnostics and presents filtered and (optionally) sorted views of the underlying problem stream.
    ProblemSettingsFilter
    A problem filter that implements filtering based the values of the following compiler options: -allow-source-path-overlap -show-actionscript-warnings -show-binding-warnings -show-deprecation-warnings -show-multiple-definition-warnings -show-unused-type-selector-warnings -strict -warn-assignment-within-conditional -warn-bad-array-cast -warn-bad-date-cast -warn-bad-nan-comparision -warn-bad-null-assignment -warn-bad-undefined-comparision -warn-const-not-initialized -warn-duplicate-variable-def -warn-instanceof-changes -warn-missing-namespace-decl -warn-no-type-decl
    WorkspaceProblemFormatter
    Problem formatter class that reports more detailed readable description of a problem.

Package org.apache.flex.compiler.clients.problems Description

This package contains classes and interfaces used by clients to report compiler problems.
